item.description: February 2nd is Groundhog Day! Join the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation and Boston Natural Areas Network as we search for clues of winter animal activity. Is the groundhog asleep? Where do animals go in winter? Unlock the mysteries of wildlife in winter on this family-friendly outdoor safari for ages 6 and up. Wear sturdy footgear and dress in layers. Be sure to bring a water bottle. We will hike unless the weather is severe. If conditions are questionable on the day of the program call the DCR at 617-333-7404 ext. 104
item.name: Groundhog Day Winter Hike at Stony Brook Reservation
